oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card of William Henry Edwards & Mary Rebecca Roach
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of William Henry Edwards, Co. E, 9th Battalion, Tennessee Cavalry CSA. Pictured with his wife, Mary Rebecca Roach, who he married in October 1865. She helped prepare meals for prisoners at Rock Hill, where she met Edwards. Photographer was Young and Evans of Columbia, Tenn..
